H0.text: What is the short metonymic name of the chief usher of the Lord Chamberlain's department of the UK House of Lords. Silver Staff

H1.text: What is the short metonymic name of the chief usher of the Lord Chamberlain's department of the UK House of Lords. Lord Marshal

H2.text: What is the short metonymic name of the chief usher of the Lord Chamberlain's department of the UK House of Lords. House Herald

H3.text: What is the short metonymic name of the chief usher of the Lord Chamberlain's department of the UK House of Lords. Black Rod

A4.text: The Gentleman or Lady Usher of the Black Rod, often shortened to Black Rod, is a senior parliamentary officer similar to a serjeant-at-arms

A5.text: Black Rod is formally appointed by the Crown based on a recruitment search performed by the Clerk of the Parliaments
